text: My hubbie brought in our 5-year old Skoda here recently...been servicing at the official dealer prior to this but heard about this place from a friend. Boss is helpful, team is super efficient, and servicing is cost effective. Happy with their work

Philip has been looking after VWs for a zillion years. Super experienced and can diagnose the issue by just looking at the car. I would define him as a specialist!

He sorted out my Mk7 Golf mechatronic (usual issue) in 4 hours (replaced and tested)! Prices are decent and reasonable.

And BTW, thanks for looking after my car!
Specialist for VW group. No frills workshop for cars. Get pass the messy workshop and you will enjoy a well serviced car.

They’re specialised in dealing with Audi and VW and they know their stuff well, they don’t overcharge you and make you change parts unnecessarily. Owner is a very nice guy and really by the book kinda guy whom you can trust.

Boss Philip knows his stuff. Mechanics are all old timers. Experienced in what they do. Specializing in VAG cars but can also do to her makes. I send my VW and MB and he gets the job done. Pricing wise, I will just say he is ethical.
